songs.title: Lover
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Lover, why don’t you come over?
You know it’s after midnight
You know it’s after midnight
Lover, where did I remember?
You since the beginning
You since the beginning

[Chorus]
Lover, you’ve already broken my heart
You’ve already broken my heart
Why have you stayed?
Why have you stayed?
'Cause lover, you’ve already ripped me apart
You’ve already broken my heart
What would it take to make you walk away?
Walk away, walk away, walk away

[Verse 2]
Here we sit in these restless mornings
You held on tighter last night than you ever had before
Here we sit in these restless mornings
You held on tighter last night than you ever had before
Than you ever had before

[Chorus]
Lover, you’ve already broken my heart
You’ve already broken my heart
Why have you stayed?
Why have you stayed?
'Cause lover, you’ve already ripped me apart
You’ve already broken my heart
What would it take to make you walk away?
Walk away, walk away, walk away

[Chorus]
Lover, you’ve already broken my heart
You’ve already broken my heart
Why have you stayed?
Why have you stayed?
'Cause lover, you’ve already ripped me apart
You’ve already broken my heart
What would it take to make you walk away?
Walk away, walk away, just walk away

[Outro]
Lover (walk away)
Lover (walk away)
Lover
